definition: A plural noun referring to the figures made out of snow, typically created during winter months, often resembling human-like shapes with a round base and stacked snowballs forming the body and head. These figures are commonly built by children or used as decorative elements during the holiday season.

examples.german: Die Kinder spielen gerne mit Schneemännern.
examples.english: The children enjoy playing with snowmen.

examples.german: Schneemänner schmelzen, wenn es warm wird.
examples.english: Snowmen melt when it gets warm.

examples.german: Schneemänner haben oft Karotten als Nase.
examples.english: Snowmen often have carrots as their nose.
